19:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-[15px] leading-[1.75] whitespace-pre-line text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-200","children":["We have workflows that need to trigger external systems when monday.com items change. I'm torn between:\n\nOption A: Use built-in automations with third-party integrations (Zapier/Make)\nOption B: Build custom webhook listeners that react to changes\n\nOur use cases:\n• When a deal closes, create a project in our internal tool\n• When a task is marked urgent, send a PagerDuty alert\n• Sync client data between monday.com and our database\n• Generate PDF reports when status changes to 'Complete'\n\nWhat are the reliability and cost trade-offs? When should I invest in custom development vs using no-code?"]}]}]

dark:text-slate-200","children":[["$","p","0",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["Great question. Here's my decision framework after building both:"]}],["$","p","1",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":[["$","strong","0",{"children":"Use built-in automations + Zapier/Make when:"}],"\n• The workflow is simple (trigger → action)\n• You need it working in hours, not days\n• Non-developers need to modify it\n• The integration already exists in the marketplace\n• Volume is low (< 1000 triggers/month)"]}],["$","p","2",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":[["$","strong","0",{"children":"Use custom webhooks when:"}],"\n• You need complex logic (conditions, loops, data transformation)\n• High volume (1000+ triggers/month) — Zapier gets expensive\n• You need guaranteed delivery and retry logic\n• Data needs to flow to internal systems behind firewalls\n• You want full control over error handling"]}],["$","p","3",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":[["$","strong","0",{"children":"For your specific cases:"}],"\n• Deal → Project: Webhook. You probably need data transformation.\n• Urgent → PagerDuty: Built-in automation with PagerDuty integration (it exists!)\n• Data sync: Webhook + database. Too complex for Zapier.\n• PDF generation: Webhook. Need custom logic for PDF creation."]}],"$L1d","$L1e"]}]]}]]}],"$L1f"]]}]

It handles surprisingly complex workflows without code."]}],["$","p","1",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["For your PDF report case: Make has a module that generates PDFs from templates. No custom development needed."]}],["$","p","2",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["For database sync: Make can connect to MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and REST APIs. We sync 5,000 records/day between monday.com and our internal DB using Make."]}],["$","p","3",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["Cost comparison for 10,000 operations/month:\n• Zapier: ~$100/month\n• Make: ~$30/month\n• Custom webhook (AWS Lambda): ~$5/month + developer time"]}],["$","p","4",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["The hidden cost of custom is maintenance. Webhooks break silently. You need monitoring, logging, and someone on call."]}],["$","p","5",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["My approach: Make for 80% of workflows, custom webhooks for the 20% that need it."]}]]}]]}]]}]
